# timeInDaylight

**Type Property**

A quantity sample type that measures amount of time the user spent in daylight.

## Declaration

```swift
static let timeInDaylight: HKQuantityTypeIdentifier
```

## Discussion

These samples use time units (described in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit]) and measure cumulative values (described in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityAggregationStyle]).

## UV exposure

- **uvExposure**: A quantity sample type that measures the user’s exposure to UV radiation.
